biography: Trevor Butterfield is a British special effects technician, background actor, and model from Holmfirth, England. Prior to his career in the film industry, Butterfield studied engineering at Huddersfield Technical College.
name: Trevor Butterfield

cast.title: 星球大战6：绝地归来
